verbs.description: [ARG0: tests after scare in sunset] [V: show] [ARG1: no pesticides independent lab tests ordered by the san francisco public utilities commission] found no evidence of pesticides in san francisco drinking water the agency announced thursday the sfpuc collected and analyzed 21 water samples following a minor panic last week after several residents in the sunset district complained that their store - bought water - testing kits yielded positive results for the herbicides atrazine and simazine their concerns were amplified over social media these independent test results confirm what our rigorous testing and monitoring program continues to show sierra nevada san francisco public utilities commission supervisor general manager harlan kelly andrew degraca director san francisco sunset reservoir dianne feinstein elementary school katy tang district four
